listitem.para: Defines the amount of time (in milliseconds) SSSD would wait for a response from a DNS server before trying the query via another DNS server.
Defines the amount of time (in seconds) to resolve a single DNS query (e.g. resolution of a hostname or an SRV record) before trying the next hostname or DNS discovery.

Defines the amount of time (in seconds) to wait for a reply from the internal failover service before assuming that the service is unreachable. If this timeout is reached, the domain will continue to operate in offline mode.
